params.name: project
params.description: JSON description of the project to be imported

params.name: projectFile
params.description: Absolute path to the file to be opened

params.name: projectFile
params.description: URL of location to save to.

getProject.description: Returns the currently open project as a json object following project.schema. Includes results.

exit.description: Exit SPIDACalc. This will shutdown control services

params.name: loadCases
params.description: Load cases to include in the analysis. If not included it will use the existing load cases. Load case names must match the names in the client file.

params.name: strengthCase
params.description: Strength case to include in the analysis. If not included it will use the existing strength case.

generateReport.description: Generate a report for the current project. Returns file location of report.

params.name: reportName
params.description: The preset custom report to generate. You can also call pre-existing Project Summary Report and Project Details Report by using that for your report name.

runScript.description: Run a script on the current project

params.name: scriptName
params.description: The script in the client file you want to run

description: This schema allows for the control of SPIDACalc.
